title: Data Brokers: How Your Personal Data Becomes Business
description: From targeted ads to identity theft, discover how data brokers operate by collecting, compiling and selling your personal information.
content: You’ve been planning on fixing your brakes and Googling auto repair shops. At the same time, you have been longing to buy butterscotch fudge ripple ice cream and searching for it on your Instacart ap… [+12615 chars]
combined_text: Data Brokers: How Your Personal Data Becomes Business. From targeted ads to identity theft, discover how data brokers operate by collecting, compiling and selling your personal information..
summary: Data brokers collect information from online activity, purchases, and public records for resale. This industry generates billions annually by creating detailed consumer profiles for marketing. Data breaches pose risks, as 40% of Americans were affected by one in the past year.

title: The Trade Desk launches new AI tool to overhaul costly third - party data buying | Advertising
combined_text: The Trade Desk launches new AI tool to overhaul costly third - party data buying | Advertising. campaignasia.com.
summary: The Trade Desk's new AI, Kokai, aims to reduce reliance on expensive third-party data by leveraging first-party data for targeting. Kokai's simulated environments help advertisers identify high-potential audiences, reportedly improving campaign performance by 30%. This shift could save companies significant costs currently allocated to less effective third-party data sources.

title: Challenge to EU - US Data Transfers Fails | Ius Laboris
combined_text: Challenge to EU - US Data Transfers Fails | Ius Laboris. jdsupra.com.
summary: The EU-US Data Privacy Framework validity was upheld, enabling transatlantic data flows to continue legally. Transfers rely on self-certification, demanding continuous compliance monitoring to avoid violations. Organizations face potential GDPR scrutiny on transfers, requiring diligent risk assessments for data protection.

title: A Guide to Data Removal Services: Should You Pay for Privacy?
description: Learn how data removal services work, their benefits, limitations, and whether a DIY approach is right for you.
content:
You're more popular than you realize, but that isn’t as good as it sounds. Some of your biggest fans are data brokers. 
Data broker companies find your personal information and sell it to eager buye… [+9517 chars]
combined_text: A Guide to Data Removal Services: Should You Pay for Privacy?. Learn how data removal services work, their benefits, limitations, and whether a DIY approach is right for you..
summary: Data removal services help reclaim privacy by scrubbing data from brokers, costing time or money. DIY removal saves money but requires consistent effort, potentially missing some broker sites. Paid services automate removal from many brokers, claiming 80-90% success, but may not eliminate all data.

title: Comprehensive Report Reviews the 2025 Power Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition ( SCADA ) Market Outlook : Emerging Trends & Strategic Roadmap to 2034
combined_text: Comprehensive Report Reviews the 2025 Power Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition ( SCADA ) Market Outlook : Emerging Trends & Strategic Roadmap to 2034. whatech.com.
summary: The SCADA market is projected to reach substantial growth, estimated at multi-billion USD by 2034. Emerging trends include cloud-based SCADA, which is seeing increased adoption by smaller firms. Strategic focus should be placed on cybersecurity upgrades to protect industrial control systems from evolving threats.

title: The Trade Desk Unveils Audience Unlimited To Make Third - Party Data Deployment More Straightforward
combined_text: The Trade Desk Unveils Audience Unlimited To Make Third - Party Data Deployment More Straightforward. bandt.com.au.
summary: The Trade Desk launched Audience Unlimited to simplify third-party data activation for advertisers. This platform streamlines audience discovery, costing 30-50% less than typical third-party data. Audience Unlimited also allows improved reach with 90% of audiences previously unreachable via traditional methods.

title: Opendatasoft Becomes Huwise and Sets Goal of Becoming Global Leader in Data Product Marketplaces
combined_text: Opendatasoft Becomes Huwise and Sets Goal of Becoming Global Leader in Data Product Marketplaces. finanznachrichten.de.
summary: Opendatasoft rebranded as Huwise to pursue global data product marketplace leadership. The company plans to offer data solutions through new partnerships and expanded offerings. Huwise aims for substantial growth in the evolving market for accessible and useful data.

title: Chile Data Center Colocation Market Supply & Demand
combined_text: Chile Data Center Colocation Market Supply & Demand. globenewswire.com.
summary: Chile's data center colocation market will grow significantly due to digitalization efforts and cloud adoption. Demand will increase with a projected 16.71% CAGR between 2023 and 2028. Investment will focus on sustainable infrastructure to comply with environmental regulations and customer demand for green solutions.
